job_tasks.phrase: Backend- en frontend-services ontwerpen, ontwikkelen, monitoren en optimaliseren
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes core software engineering activities related to designing, developing, monitoring, and optimizing services, fitting the definition of traditional software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Helpen bij het bouwen van kernfuncties van Neople
job_tasks.justification: Building core features of a product is a fundamental software engineering task, aligning with the development and integration of software.

job_tasks.phrase: Het bouwen van integraties met verschillende API's van onze klanten
job_tasks.justification: Integrating with external APIs is a common software development task, falling under the scope of software integration.
Integrating with specific systems like contact centers is a software integration task, part of building interconnected systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Werken aan de UI om documenttraining en aanmoediging toegankelijk te maken voor onze klanten
job_tasks.justification: Developing user interfaces (UI) is a core part of front-end software development, fitting the definition of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Het verbeteren van onze code en voortduren op zoek zijn naar manieren om meer onderhoudbare en schaalbare services te schrijven.
job_tasks.justification: Focus on code quality, maintainability, and scalability are hallmarks of software engineering best practices, aligning with the development and integration of robust services.

soft_skills.phrase: Je spreekt vloeiend Engels of Nederlands
Je neemt beveiliging en privacy serieus, net als wij.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses exclusively on core software engineering tasks (backend/frontend development, integrations, UI work, code optimization) which fall under Macro-Category A. While the company's mission involves AI and LLMs, the engineer's specific responsibilities do not include model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or AI-specific data engineering. Therefore, the role is classified as AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, as they build the software infrastructure that supports AI features.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and detailed regarding the required responsibilities and technical skills, leaving little ambiguity in classifying the role's primary focus on software engineering within an AI-centric company.
